channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024070505
item.description:
Report X-2024070505

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-07
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The five gallon pail broke through the pallet causing lid to hit another pail. The lid became bent causing a spillage. Was stated that another piece of freight may have shifted during transit and landed on the five gallon pail causing the pail to break through the pallet.

item.title: Report X-2024070651
item.description:
Report X-2024070651

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-03
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO (4) PACKAGES THAT WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT EACH PACKAGE CONTAINED APPROXIMATELY 1 POUND OF UNDECLARED DRY ICE COOLING COOKIES FOR A TOTAL OF 4 POUNDS OF UNDECLARED DRY ICE IN THE SHIPMENT. NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1ZY76W810199158544, 1ZY76W810196263319 AND 1ZY76W810199322339. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
